gallery:
Network Appliance IOPs by protocol Robert McDermott We use a combination of RRDtool, SNMP and Python to gather metrics and generate graphs for several of our critical systems. This graph shows a three hour window of the disk IO activity on one of our NetApp filers broken down by protocol (CIFS, NFS, FCP and iSCSI). 2007 12
# rmcdermo@gmail.com
